main_address_raw_text: pragathi nagar road, aleap industrial area near kukatpally, beside nizampet back road miyapur hyderabad, telangana. 500090.
short_description: nan convention is an events venue based in hyderabad, india.
long_description: over 1,00,000 + square feet of flexible space with 3 event halls, our state-of-the-art facility can accommodate events of all sizes and types. our mission is to provide exceptional service and support to make your event a grand success. from choosing the perfect venue and catering to managing logistics and providing technical support, we have the expertise and resources to make your event unforgettable. our chairman's vision statement "be committed to sustainability and dedicated to giving back to our community". we support local organizations and charities through donations, volunteerism, and partnerships. we believe that by working together, we can make a positive impact on the world around us. n nan convention center is one of the best function hall in hyderabad. here one hall provides a seating capacity of 500 to 700. the banquet halls have an inviting ambiance that makes everyone feel greeted. its our duty to make your special occasion grand success at our venues. planning to host any event nan is the best choice.
generated_description: nan convention center is a premier event venue located in bachupally mandal, telangana. the center offers over 100,000 square feet of flexible space with three state-of-the-art event halls, capable of accommodating events of all sizes and types. the venue is suitable for a variety of occasions, including weddings, receptions, corporate events, product launches, and conferences. nan convention center features amenities such as air conditioning, changing rooms, valet parking, catering, and separate dining halls. the center also provides guest rooms and in-house decoration and catering services. the facility is known for its spacious parking area that can accommodate up to 2000 cars.
